Author: alchademy
Text: >something i rarely hear but some try to convince you to lose weight in a "healthy" way. but do you think I've never tried all those healthy ways before? It's not easy to go back to these when I've discovered more intense and effective ways.  THIS. i recently quit recovery & my boyfriend is always like "if you feel fat just eat a little less & workout." pfff, once you've found the cheat you can't just play the game without it.

Author: flightless_bird666
Text: y'll i'm not pro-ana or any of that shit i'm just talking about my personal experience.
